I’m a Molecular Eco-Epidemiologist with expertise in diagnostics, pathogen genomics, and disease surveillance at the human–wildlife interface. I have 10 years of field and lab experience in the Amazon, leading One Health research with Indigenous communities.
Currently based in London, UK.
